description: Extension and alteration to existing unauthorised building in association with change of use to B1
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed building by reason of its design, excessive size and prominence will have a detrimental impact on the character and appearance of adjacent buildings, the rear elevations of properties along Jackson Road and on the street scene.  The development is contrary to policies 7.4 (Local Character) and 7.6 (Architecture) of the London Plan 2011, policies CS8 (Enhancing Islington’s character) and CS9 (Protecting and enhancing Islington’s built and historic environment) of the Islington Core Strategy 2011 and policies D4 (Designing in Context), D8 (Boundary Walls, Paving and Street Furniture) and D11 (Alterations and Extensions) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and the Islington Urban Design Guidelines 2006.
